machine_start_gcode.default_value:
; FELIXprinters | www.FELIXprinters.com | Zeemanlaan 15 3401 MV IJsselstein The Netherlands
; FELIX Tec 4 | Start Code Dual Extruders v1.0
; Modified by kerog777@gmail.com
;================================ 
;Initializing
M80   ; Turn on the power supply
M107     ; Turn off fans
M117 Heating up
M140 S{bed_temperature}   ; Heatup Bed and continue
M104 T0 S{print_temperature}   ; Heatup hot-end and continue
M104 T1 120                             ; Heat extruder #2 to homing temp
G28             ; Home all
M109 T0 S{print_temperature}   ; Heatup hot-end and continue
M117 Purging
T0    ; Select extruder 1
G92 E0    ; Reset extruder
M109 T0 S{extruder0_temperature}   ; Heatup hot-end and wait
T0    ; Select extruder 1

;================================ ; Initializing done
M117 FELIXprinting

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
; FELIXprinters End Code Tec Series v1.0
; Modified by kerog777@gmail.com
; ================================= 
; Move extruder to park position
G91       ; Make coordinates relative
G1 Z2 F1000       ; Move z 2mm up
G90       ; Use absolute coordinates again
  G1 X0 Y0 F15240   ; Move bed and printhead to ergonomic position

; ================================= ; Turn off heaters
M140 S0    ; Turn off bed heater
T0    ; Select left extruder
M104 T0 S0    ; Turn off heater and continue
 G92 E0    ; Reset extruder position
G1 E-6    ; Retract filament 8mm
G92 E0    ; Reset extruder position
T1    ; Select right extruder
M104 T1 S0    ; Turn off heater and continue
G92 E0    ; Reset extruder position
G1 E-6    ; Retract filament 8mm
G92 E0    ; Reset extruder position
T0    ; Select left extruder

; ================================= ; Turn the rest off
M107        ; Turn off fan
M84    ; Disable steppers
M117 Finished Printing!
